motd: Bugfix: Spellblade no longer interferes with Skarner's Fracture cooldown reduction.
Hotfix: No longer grants Electrocute/Phase Rush stacks. Spellblade damage is no longer considered part of attack damage for most ability scalings.

passive_1: After using an ability, your next basic attack (on-hit) deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage (1.5 second cooldown, begins after using the empowered attack).
motd: Note: The exact patch this change was made on is unknown.

passive_1: After using an ability, your next basic attack (on-hit) deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage (2 second cooldown).
After using an ability, your next basic attack (on-hit) deals 80% base AD bonus physical damage (2 second cooldown).
After using an ability, your next basic attack (on-hit) deals 80% base AD bonus physical damage (3 second cooldown).
After using an ability, your next basic attack (on-hit) deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage (3 second cooldown).

motd: Change: Spellblade can no longer crit.

passive_1: After using an ability, your next basic attack (on-hit) deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage.
